name: openapi-enums
description: A minimal example that shows some issues with enums by generated code in the openapi-generator

scripts.generate-api: openapi-generator-cli generate -o api -i ./openapi.yaml -g javascript && cd api && npm install && npm audit fix --force
scripts.generate-ts-api: openapi-generator-cli generate -o api -i ./openapi.yaml -g typescript && cd api && npm install && npm audit fix --force

author: Max Schmitt - BasysKom
